thread.title: BenefitMall Announces Todd Waletzki as President, Payroll Division

author: cnbc.com
title: BenefitMall Announces Todd Waletzki as President, Payroll Division
text:
DALLAS, March 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- BenefitMall , the leading provider of employee benefits and payroll services, announces the promotion of Todd Waletzki to President, Payroll Division. This promotion comes as BenefitMall creates the new roles of President, Payroll Division and President, Benefits Division.
Waletzki, currently serving as Chief Operating Officer, will assume the role of President, Payroll Division effective immediately. In this position, Waletzki will oversee the growth and strategy for the division with direct accountability for all sales and operations of payroll products.
"Todd Waletzki's leadership of the Payroll Division will drive accelerated growth in our Payroll/HR/Benefits Administration solutions," said Scott Kirksey, CEO for BenefitMall. "I am confident his expertise will lead our sales team towards continuous growth and ensure exceptional service on all fronts."
Waletzki joined BenefitMall in 2015 and with him brought more than 25 years of leadership and industry experience. Prior to joining the BenefitMall team, Waletzki served as the Managing Vice President of US Card Operations for CapitalOne and Chief Operating Officer of CompuPay. He received his Bachelor of Science in Economics from Bemidji State University and his Master of Science in Economics from Southern Illinois University.
"This new structure is part of our strategic growth plan, and will support our ability to execute more expeditiously as we implement new products and services to meet the evolving needs of our clients and partners," said Kirksey. "With this announcement, we are furthering our commitment to the total Payroll, HR, and Benefits solution that the SMB market needs."
BenefitMall has started a national search for the President, Benefits Division. Both roles of President, Benefits Division and President, Payroll Division will report directly to Kirksey. These two divisions will continue to be supported in their sales and service goals by BenefitMall's combined shared corporate services team.
About BenefitMall
Headquartered in Dallas, BenefitMall partners with a network of 20,000 Brokers and CPAs to deliver employee benefits and payroll services to more than 200,000 small and medium-sized businesses. By combining payroll and benefits, BenefitMall empowers Trusted Advisors to develop the best employee programs while maintaining compliance with government regulations and Health Care Reform.
Owned by Management and The Carlyle Group, BenefitMall also operates HealthCareExchange.com , the leading online community for information regarding the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act. More information is available at www.benefitmall.com .
